<title level="1" pfs="Limited">[Bandit](/NPCs.aspx?ID=887)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

By setting ambushes and traps in concealing countryside, such as forests and mountains, bandits waylay travelers and plunder their valuables before disappearing back to their wilderness hideouts. Many bandits seek only to steal and release their victims alive, though a few prefer to leave no witnesses.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/NPCs/Criminal_Bandit.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Bandit](/NPCs.aspx?ID=887)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 208</row>

**Perception** +6

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +6, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +5, [Forest Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +4, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +6, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +8, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +6, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +3

**Con** +1

**Int** +0

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Items**
[Hatchet](/Weapons.aspx?ID=27), [Sling](/Weapons.aspx?ID=72) (10 bullets), [Studded Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=5)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 19 

**Fort** +7 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +6 

</row>

**HP** 30

**Bandit's Ambush** When the bandit rolls initiative using [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) or [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15), they can attempt to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53) one creature as a free action.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hatchet +9 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)),
**Damage** 1d6+5 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
sling +9 ([Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 50 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d6+3 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hatchet +9 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6+5 slashing

**Dread Striker**   [Frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) creatures are [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) to the bandit.

**Favored Terrain**   The bandit ignores the effects of non-magical difficult terrain in forests.

</column>
